title: 일본지부 9주년 허브
content:

----

**//자, 가자. 울음을 울리자.//**

[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A4137401-11-9cb8/%E3%83%8D%E3%82%B3%E3%81%A8%E9%97%98%E4%BA%89%E3%81%9B%E3%82%88%E3%83%90%E3%83%8A%E3%83%BC.png]]

**Round 0**
[[span class="contest"]][*http://scp-jp.wikidot.com/forum/t-14587498/scp-af2022-jp 고양이(신)과 투쟁하라!][[/span]]

[[span class="presenter"]]produced by: [[*user solvex]] + AF-2022-JP 기획위원회[[/span]]
**4/1**

------
**//기르자, 새싹!//**

[[image http://scp-jp-storage.wdfiles.com/local--files/file%3A7307226-2-hhoc/wakababanner_2]]

**Round 1 [춘계 중상]**
[[span class="contest"]][[[wakaba-contest-2022|2022년 떡잎 경연]]][[/span]]

**04/30 - --06/11-- 06/18**
